name: Bugging Bullets (WowieJam2)
description:
This is my first attept at taking part on a game jam. 

The jam's topic was, "Intentional Bugs". As I didn't have much time left after loosing almost 2 days of jork, I had to change my point of view, so...

"They keep bugging me!". Not the best I could have done but its something. :) (Game pretty much rushed).

Controls: Just use WASD, you dummy!! :P

You should get it eventually, but if you didn't, let me explain; the thruster is broken, so sometimes it shold stop "thrusting". Or so should it be. Sadly, I did not have any time left for that. ;(

Note: collision detection was forced to be bad.

P.S: the bullets were an inspiration from Enter the gungeon, a game I've been playing a lot of recently.

It is for the WOWIE Jam 2 (2020), hosted by Jonas Tyroller,  creator of "Will You Snail?"
